info.author: Wojtek Siudzinski
info.description:
# img2h

Utility which converts bitmaps to C/C++ byte arrays.

## Instalation

```
$ pip install img2h
```

## Usage

```
$ img2h --help
Usage: img2h [OPTIONS] IMAGE_FILE

Options:
  --threshold INTEGER              Pixels with brightness lower that this will be on
  --show-output / --no-show-output Show output image
  --invert / --no-invert           Invert output image
  --help                           Show this message and exit.
```
info.keywords: bitmap bytearray arduino spark core photon wiring
info.name: img2h
info.summary: Utility which converts bitmaps to C/C++ byte arrays used in microcontrollers like Arduino on Spark Core/Photon.
info.html_description:
# img2h

Utility which converts bitmaps to C/C++ byte arrays.

## Instalation

```
$ pip install img2h
```

## Usage

```
$ img2h --help
Usage: img2h [OPTIONS] IMAGE_FILE

Options:
--threshold INTEGER Pixels with brightness lower that this will be on
--show-output / --no-show-output Show output image
--invert / --no-invert Invert output image
--help Show this message and exit.
```
